name: Sausages
description: So our friend Steve challenged us to hack into his server. You can access it at ssh -p 2222 vuln2015.icec.tf. He remembered to turn off password authentication though. Oh, we also found his GitHub account, it's here.
hint:
This time you'll really have to break RSA. There's something wrong with his key, can you find it?

Oh, and Steve really likes german sausages :) be sure to leave him some on the server.
